titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bronate Advanced.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/26/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on ,6-dibromo-4-cyanophenyl octanoate/heptanoate 2-ethylhexyl (4-chloro-2-methylphenoxy)acetate (Bronate Advanced).
